function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate cleaning schedules and signage locations based solely on WHO guidelines, without consideration of simulated contamination frequency.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to ineffective cleaning and signage strategies.","Mitigation":"Use simulated data to inform and adjust cleaning schedules and signage locations for more effective disease control.","Technologies":"OccSim for generating 'data-driven space utilization guidelines.","People":"Building facility managers, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building facility managers, health and safety officers"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding of virus transmission among building occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to lack of knowledge about how viruses spread in the built environment.","Mitigation":"Use OccSim as a learning tool to educate building occupants about virus transmission and the importance of preventive measures such as mask-wearing.","Technologies":"OccSim as a learning tool for understanding virus transmission.","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Health and safety officers, building management"},{"Description":"Suboptimal placement of air cleaners without consideration of simulated data.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of air cleaners in controlling airborne contamination.","Mitigation":"Use simulated data to inform the optimal placement of air cleaners for maximum effectiveness in reducing airborne contamination.","Technologies":"OccSim for simulating and analyzing optimal placement of air cleaners.","People":"Building facility managers, maintenance staff","Owner":"Building facility managers, maintenance staff"}]}
